name: Destroy Them !
description:
Welcome to Destroy Them - the ultimate First Person Shooter arcade game where your mission is to obliterate all the robots across four different maps using advanced movements and tactics to earn points and beat your high score!

As you dive into each map, you'll find yourself surrounded by robotic enemies. But fear not, because you're armed with an assault rifle and you can move with advanced movements, you will be able to escape the ennemies with skill and ease.

And what sets 'Destroy Them' apart is its accessibility. Designed to run on practically any computer, whether it's a high-end gaming rig or a humble system, this game ensures that everyone can have fun, a bit like a flash game.

Play around on 4 different maps and maybe more that will come out later, all very different and fun in their own way. (some are KINDA unbalanced ngl)

So what are you waiting for? Play Destroy Them right now ! Whether you're a gamer looking for a challenge or a newbie wanting to dive into the action and have fun, this game is right for you !
